name: Squareshire
description:
L-Click to place buildings
R-Click to rotate buildings

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, thwarted by the record-breaking 2022 mid-July heatwave in the UK

Partially inspired by this comic, partcially by the jam theme 'Roll the dice' - the map generation and sequence of buildings are all determined by 2d6 dice rolls, kinda like Settlers of Catan.
